channel.title: Becoming The Unbeatable
channel.description: Recent content on Becoming The Unbeatable

item.title: Becoming Leetcode Pro
item.description: draft ongoing Prefix-Suffix pattern In many problems, when we have to find something like number of triplets (x, y, z) on some conditions, we can use prefix-suffix pattern. general concept n = len(arr) prefix = [0] * (n+1) suffix = [0] * (n+1) ans = [0]*n # calculating prefix for i in range(1, n+1): prefix[i] = # calculation # calculating suffix for i in range(n, -1, -1): suffix[i] = # calculation # in many cases, we can do calculation in single loop # but, it always easy to calculate in two loops for i in range(n): ans[i] = combine(prefix[i], suffix[i+1]) problems 2179.

item.title: Stat Rethink
item.description: Lecture notes on Statistical Rethinking L: 2

item.title: LC contest problems summary
item.description: Biweekly-66 (27th Nov, 2021) 2085. Count Common Words With One Occurrence Hint 1 Use hashmap (Counter) 2086. Minimum Number of Buckets Required to Collect Rainwater from Houses" Hint 1 First put the bucket at best place and the remove those covering home. Hint 2 Answer is (best bucket cnt + remaining house). Hint 3 Corner case: check for each house is coverable

item.title: Hugo commands
item.description: Hugo build/export the site hugo -d ../becoming-the-unbeatable relative imports example: static\icons\favicon.png relative imports: icons\favicon.png fix for label image icon: /becoming-the-unbeatable/small_icon.jpg instead of icon: small_icon.png github issue: https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod/issues/622
